com.CSC203.Final_Project

Class MessageSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CSC203.Final_Project.MessageSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttCallback

    public class MessageSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttCallback
    This class handles the connecting to the MQTT broker and then facilitating the delivery of messages as well as the handling of rooms. There is no form of persistence among the messages.
    Author:
    Anthony Parsch Jr.
